channel.title: 投稿技巧 on Dong's blog
channel.description: Recent content in 投稿技巧 on Dong's blog

item.title: 延期申请
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Leiming Dong)
item.description: Dear Editor, We appreciate that you gave us a chance of major revision to improve our manuscript (NEFO-D-17-00012) to a level suitable for publication in your journal. I am afraid we can not finish the revision before the deadline (Dec 12) because some questions that the reviewers gave us had not been carefully considered before and have taken us a lot of time. Therefore I write this Email to request an extension of two weeks (Dec 26).

item.title: 期望与方差.h
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Leiming Dong)
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 期望与方差 body { margin: 0; font-family: “Helvetica Neue”, Helvetica, Arial, “Hiragino Sans GB”, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; color: #777; background-color: white; } .container { width: 700px; margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; } .post { font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, "SimSun", serif; position: relative; padding: 70px; bottom: 0; overflow-y: auto; font-size: 16px; font-weight: normal; line-height: 25px; color: #515151; } .post h1{ font-size: 50px; font-weight: 500; line-height: 60px; margin-bottom: 40px; color: inherit; } .

item.title: 致谢
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Leiming Dong)
item.description: I am grateful to two anonymous referees for useful comments on an earlier version of this manuscript. We would like to thank Drs. Peter Clarke, Steen Magnussen, and John King for their stimulating discussion on the research; Dr. William Wingle for his excellent help in the data analyses with his UNCERT program; and Dr. Rowland Burdon for his constructive comments on the early version of the manuscript. This research is financially supported by Forest Renewal BC research grant No.
